id: Overview/Penalties and Enforcement under the DPDPA
title: Penalties and Enforcement under the DPDPA
description: The Digital Personal Data Protection Act (DPDPA), 2023 is not just a statement of rights and duties; it is a binding law with real consequences for non-compliance. To ensure that organizations treat personal data with seriousness, the Act empowers the Data Protection Board of India to enforce compliance and impose penalties when violations occur.
